headline: CVC DIFFUSION PUMP 1,600 L/S
description: 6-inch "Blueline" Diffusion Pump    Water cooled with 1800W 6-cartridge heater
keywords: diffusion vacuum pumps diff pumps  diff pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Diffusion Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer CVC
Model PMCS-6B
Inlet Flange ASA 152.4 mm (6.000 in)
Foreline Flange ASA 101.6 mm (4.000 in)
Pumping Speed Helium 1,600.00 l/s (3,390.55 CFM)
Pumping Speed Air 1,400.00 l/s (2,966.73 CFM)
Ultimate Pressure 1.00E-4(En) torr (1.33E-4 mbar)
Warmup Time 8 Minutes
Cooldown Time 20 Minutes
Fluid Charge 0.80 L (0.21 gal, 0.18 Br gal)
Water Connection 1/4" FPT
Other Information Max throughput: 6.5 torr/l/sec
Backing pump: 10 cfm
Backstreaming rate: Inlet: 11"OD, 7"ID, 8 x 7/8" bolts on 9.5" circle
Outlet: 7.5"OD, 2.8"ID, 4 x 3/4" bolts on 6" circle
Power Requirements 115 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Condition New-Never Used
Exterior Dimensions
Width 22.000 in (55.9 cm)
Height 20.500 in (52.1 cm)
Weight 50 lb (23 kg)
